codePatterns: Phase 0 migration pattern: check for legacy files before creating new ones
Verification loop: Build → Tests → Lint → Typecheck (ALL must pass)
projectSpecificRules: setup.sh uses inline content, not template files
Migration must be in both /setup and /start for robustness
Skill definitions (commands/*.md) MUST match setup.sh for file creation

lessons: Test setup.sh in the harness repo itself to catch inception issues
Consider upgrade path when making breaking changes
Delete unused code (templates) rather than trying to sync it
Never trust self-assessment - always run actual verification commands
Loop state must persist across context windows
Both setup.sh AND commands/setup.md must be updated together

hotspots: setup.sh - contains all embedded file content
commands/setup.md - skill definition must match setup.sh
